title: Karol a Man Who Became Pope 2005 DVDR R4 NTSC
description:
At 18, the young Polish Karol Wojtyla devoted up to the studies and the desire to be an actor and writer. But when the consequences of World War II come to haunt his country, Karol witnesses the horrors of a cruelly persecuted and destroyed people. Faced with so much pain, he decides to become a priest to help those in need. Begins its journey to the devotion and hope. Wojtyla accepted his fate and became Pope John Paul II, the most beloved and popular of all time, and was given until the end to ease the suffering and anguish of the man.
